attributes.action: stop subsidies for the bars and restaurants in the Houses of Commons
attributes.additional_details: In a time of austerity the house of commons should lead by example. Stop the subsidies for restaurants and bars in the house of commons. MPs should practice what they preach. This subsidies allowance is a mockery to the general public. Again lead the country by example and stop portraying George Orwell's , "Animal Farm ! ". Vote to end house of commons bar and restaurants.
